name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LAiPIC.AI: Quickly turn URL links into AI video ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your swift & powerful AI video maker: A simple instruction can turn URL links into AI video ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect product information from the detail pages of selected products on leading international e-commerce platforms.

Using LAiPIC.AI extension, you can effortlessly capture and analyze detailed product information, then assist in converting it into a video while minimizing the need for manual operation!

Key Features:
🔗Advanced Data Capture : After installing our extension, utilize advanced data models to accurately capture and identify product information.
🔗Assisted Video Creation: Streamlines the conversion of content into videos, minimizing the need for manual intervention.
🔗High Efficiency: In just a few seconds, obtain a high-quality video showcasing your products or services.
🔗Free extension: Our extension is entirely free; you can download and use it directly from the Chrome Web Store.
🔗Strict Compliance: We strictly adhere to platform regulations, safeguarding user privacy and rights.

How to Use:
🔍Click the "Add to Chrome" button and add the extension to your browser toolbar.
🔍Open the website: https://www.laipic.ai/
🔍Copy the URL of the product you want to analyze and paste it into the feature bar.
🔍LAiPIC.AI will automatically capture and analyze the product information from the link and assist in generating the corresponding video.

FAQs:
📌 Which search engines are supported?
-Currently, we support Google and plan to support more search engines in the future.
📌 In which countries can LAiPIC.AI extension be used?
-LAiPIC.AI extension can be used in any country or region globally.
📌 Is it free to use?
-Yes, the LAiPIC.AI extension is completely free.
📌 Why do link capture failures occur sometimes?
-Link capture failures may occur on certain gift card pages, out-of-stock items, or products not available for international sales. It is recommended to try again.

📮 For any questions or suggestions, please contact us at sg@laipic.us
Install LAiPIC.AI extension today and try it now!
